abstract: Some reports have Apple finally introducing Siri's technology on the iPhone.
snippet: Some reports have Apple finally introducing Siri's technology on the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: In the late 1980s Apple created a mock-up video of a product called the "Knowledge Navigator." The Navigator envisioned a future in which tabletlike computers would come with personal assistants that could help people navigate a number of mundane daily tasks.

headline.main: The iPhone Could Finally Get Its Personal Assistant
